# Explicit Agent Protocol + Knowledge Graph Memory

[![Node.js](https://img.shields.io/badge/Node.js-v18+-informational?logo=node.js)](https://nodejs.org/)
[![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-MIT-blue.svg)](LICENSE)
[![npm version](https://badge.fury.io/js/mcp-blink-memory.svg)](https://badge.fury.io/js/mcp-blink-memory)

**Explicit Agent Protocol with Knowledge Graph Memory** - ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏à‡∏≥‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏£‡∏π‡πâ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö AI agents ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πà‡∏á‡πÉ‡∏™‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÑ‡∏î‡πâ ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö semantic search, auto-tagging, ‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ lineage tracking ‡πÇ‡∏î‡∏¢‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ ES6 modules ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö standalone (‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á server ‡∏´‡∏£‡∏∑‡∏≠ Docker)

## ‚ú® ‡∏Ñ‡∏∏‡∏ì‡∏™‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å

- **üèóÔ∏è Knowledge Graph Core** - ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ entities, relations, observations ‡πÉ‡∏ô‡∏£‡∏π‡∏õ‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏≤‡∏ü‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏∑‡∏î‡∏´‡∏¢‡∏∏‡πà‡∏ô
- **üîç Semantic Search** - ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ vector embeddings (OpenAI, HuggingFace, Mock)
- **üè∑Ô∏è Auto-Tagging** - ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á tags ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏à‡∏≤‡∏Å‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏´‡∏≤ (‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏§‡∏©)
- **üìú Lineage Tracking** - ‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏ô‡∏ó‡∏∂‡∏Å‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ß‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏î‡∏≥‡πÄ‡∏ô‡∏¥‡∏ô‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å‡∏Ç‡∏±‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏ï‡∏≠‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏ö‡∏ö audit-ready
- **üå± Root Memory Node** - ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ memory node ‡∏´‡∏•‡∏±‡∏Å (#0) ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö system baseline
- **‚öôÔ∏è Modular Architecture** - ‡πÅ‡∏¢‡∏Å modules ‡∏ä‡∏±‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏à‡∏ô‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞ extensible
- **üíæ Persistent Storage** - ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ JSON files ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö data persistence
- **üåç Multi-Language** - ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏õ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏°‡∏ß‡∏•‡∏ú‡∏•‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢‡πÅ‡∏•‡∏∞‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏§‡∏©

## üèóÔ∏è ‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏õ‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¢‡∏Å‡∏£‡∏£‡∏°‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö

```
Explicit Agent Protocol + KG Memory Architecture
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.js                          # üéØ Public API Surface
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Core Functions                # createEntities(), addObservations(), etc.
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mock Implementations          # ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö modules ‡∏ó‡∏µ‡πà‡∏¢‡∏±‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏™‡∏°‡∏ö‡∏π‡∏£‡∏ì‡πå
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Health Check                  # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏™‡∏ñ‡∏≤‡∏ô‡∏∞‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ modules/                          # üì¶ Modular Components
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory_graph/                 # üß† Knowledge Graph Core
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Entity Management         # createEntities(), deleteEntities()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Relation Management       # createRelations(), semanticSearch()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Observation Handling      # addObservations(), searchByTag()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Graph Analytics           # getGraphStats(), readGraph()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ embedding_service/            # üîó Text-to-Vector Embeddings
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Mock Implementation       # generateMockVector()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ OpenAI Integration        # callOpenAIEmbeddings()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ HuggingFace Integration   # callHuggingFaceEmbeddings()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Vector Math               # cosineSimilarity(), normalizeVector()
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ auto_tag_service/             # üè∑Ô∏è Automatic Tagging
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Basic Keyword Extraction  # ‡∏£‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö‡∏†‡∏≤‡∏©‡∏≤‡πÑ‡∏ó‡∏¢/‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Å‡∏§‡∏©
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Advanced NLP              # Noun phrases, named entities
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ ML-based Tagging          # Mock ML predictions
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory0_service/              # üå± Root Memory Management
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ ensureRoot()              # ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á root memory node
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ linkToRoot()              # ‡πÄ‡∏ä‡∏∑‡πà‡∏≠‡∏° entities ‡∏Å‡∏±‡∏ö root
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ getRootMemory()           # ‡∏î‡∏∂‡∏á root memory data
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ system/                       # ‚öôÔ∏è System Utilities
‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ validateStructure()       # ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πå
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ selfDescribe()            # System description
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory/                           # üíæ Persistent Storage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory_store.json             # Main entities & relations
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lineage_log.json              # Operation history
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ embedding_cache.json          # Vector embeddings cache
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tag_model.json                # Tagging model data
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tag_cache.json                # Tag cache
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ config/                           # ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ access_policy.yaml            # File access permissions
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ docs/                             # üìö Documentation
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ audit_log.md                  # Audit trail
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ legacy_clues.md               # Migration notes
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ changelog.md                  # Version history
‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ .github/                          # ü§ù GitHub Integration
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ workflows/                    # CI/CD pipelines
```

## üöÄ ‡πÄ‡∏£‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

### ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡πÄ‡∏ö‡∏∑‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏á‡∏ï‡πâ‡∏ô

- **Node.js** ‚â• 18.0.0
- **npm** ‚â• 8.0.0
- **Git** (‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö clone repository)

### ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á

```bash
# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/your-org/mcp-blink-memory.git
cd mcp-blink-memory

# ‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á dependencies
npm install

# ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏ï‡∏¥‡∏î‡∏ï‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á
npm run test:bootstrap
```

### Environment Variables (‡πÑ‡∏°‡πà‡∏ö‡∏±‡∏á‡∏Ñ‡∏±‡∏ö)

```bash
# Embedding configuration
EMBEDDING_MODE=openai                    # mock, openai, huggingface
OPENAI_API_KEY=sk-your-openai-key        # ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö OpenAI embeddings
HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY=hf-your-hf-key       # ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö HuggingFace embeddings
EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS=384                 # Vector dimensions

# Tagging configuration
TAG_MODE=advanced                        # basic, advanced, ml
TAG_LANGUAGE=th                          # th, en

# System configuration
NODE_ENV=development                     # development, production
```

## üìñ ‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ‡∏á‡∏≤‡∏ô

### 1. Initialization - ‡πÄ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏µ‡∏¢‡∏°‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö

```javascript
import { ensureInitialized, healthCheck } from './index.js';

// Initialize system
await ensureInitialized();

// Health check
const status = await healthCheck();
console.log('System Status:', status);
```

### 2. ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á Entities - ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏°‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏°‡∏π‡∏•‡πÉ‡∏´‡∏°‡πà

```javascript
// ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á entities ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏° auto-tagging
const entities = [
  {
    name: "AI Research Lab",
    type: "organization",
    observations: [
      "Laboratory focused on artificial intelligence research and development",
      "Located in Bangkok, Thailand",
      "Specializes in natural language processing and computer vision"
    ],
    data: {
      founded: 2020,
      employees: 25,
      website: "https://ai-lab.th"
    }
  },
  {
    name: "Dr. Somchai AI",
    type: "person",
    observations: [
      "Lead researcher at AI Research Lab",
      "PhD in Machine Learning from Chulalongkorn University",
      "Specializes in transformer models and semantic search"
    ]
  }
];

// Create with auto-tagging and link to root
const created = await createEntities(entities, {
  autoTag: true,
  linkToMemory0: true
});

console.log(`Created ${created.length} entities with tags:`);
created.forEach(entity => {
  console.log(`- ${entity.name}: ${entity.autoTags?.join(', ') || 'no tags'}`);
});
```

### 3. Semantic Search - ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢‡∏Ñ‡∏ß‡∏≤‡∏°‡∏´‡∏°‡∏≤‡∏¢

```javascript
// ‡∏Ñ‡πâ‡∏ô‡∏´‡∏≤‡∏î‡πâ‡∏ß‡∏¢ semantic similarity
const results = await semanticSearch("artificial intelligence research in Thailand", {
  topK: 5,
  threshold: 0.3,
  tagFilter: ['ai', 'research', 'thailand']
});

console.log('Semantic Search Results:');
results.forEach((result, index) => {
  console.log(`${index + 1}. ${result.entity.name} (similarity: ${result.similarity.toFixed(3)})`);
  console.log(`   Tags: ${result.matchedTags.join(', ')}`);
  console.log(`   Observations: ${result.observations.map(o => o.content.substring(0, 50) + '...').join('; ')}`);
});
```

### 4. Auto-Tagging - ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á tags ‡∏≠‡∏±‡∏ï‡πÇ‡∏ô‡∏°‡∏±‡∏ï‡∏¥

```javascript
// ‡πÄ‡∏û‡∏¥‡πà‡∏° observations ‡∏û‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≠‡∏° auto-tagging
const observations = [
  {
    entityName: "AI Research Lab",
    contents: [
      "Recently published paper on Thai language models in ACL 2024",
      "Developing new semantic search engine for Thai documents",
      "Collaborating with universities on AI education programs"
    ],
    source: "news article"
  }
];

const tagged = await addObservations(observations, { autoTag: true });

console.log('Auto-tagged observations:');
tagged.forEach(obs => {
  console.log(`Entity: ${obs.entityName}`);
  console.log(`Generated tags: ${obs.autoTags.join(', ')}`);
  console.log(`Confidence: ${obs.tagConfidence?.map(c => c.toFixed(2)).join(', ')}`);
});
```

### 5. Graph Operations - ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£ Knowledge Graph

```javascript
// ‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á relations ‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏´‡∏ß‡πà‡∏≤‡∏á entities
const relations = [
  {
    from: "AI Research Lab",
    to: "Dr. Somchai AI",
    relationType: "employs",
    properties: { role: "lead researcher", since: "2020" }
  },
  {
    from: "Dr. Somchai AI",
    to: "AI Research Lab",
    relationType: "works_at",
    properties: { position: "Lead AI Researcher" }
  }
];

const relationResult = await createRelations(relations, { linkToMemory0: true });
console.log(`Created ${relationResult.created} relations`);

// ‡∏≠‡πà‡∏≤‡∏ô graph ‡∏ó‡∏±‡πâ‡∏á‡∏´‡∏°‡∏î
const fullGraph = await readGraph();
console.log(`Graph stats: ${fullGraph.stats.totalEntities} entities, ${fullGraph.stats.totalRelations} relations`);
```

### 6. System Management - ‡∏à‡∏±‡∏î‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡∏£‡∏∞‡∏ö‡∏ö

```javascript
// ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á
const isValid = await validateStructure();
console.log('Structure validation:', isValid ? 'PASS' : 'FAIL');

// Self-description
const description = await selfDescribe();
console.log('System description:', JSON.stringify(description, null, 2));

// Health check
const health = await healthCheck();
console.log('Health status:', health);
```

## üìÅ ‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå

```
mcp-blink-memory/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ index.js                          # üéØ Main API entry point
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ package.json                      # üì¶ Dependencies & scripts
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ README.md                         # üìñ Documentation
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ init.ps1                          # üõ†Ô∏è Project initialization (Windows)
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ manifest.yaml                     # üìã System manifest
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ structure.schema.yaml             # üèóÔ∏è Project structure validation
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ config/
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ access_policy.yaml            # üîê File access permissions
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ docs/                             # üìö Documentation
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ audit_log.md                  # üìù Audit trail
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ legacy_clues.md               # üîç Migration notes
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ changelog.md                  # üìà Version history
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory/                           # üíæ Data storage
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory_store.json             # üß† Main knowledge graph
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ lineage_log.json              # üìú Operation history
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ embedding_cache.json          # üîó Vector cache
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ tag_model.json                # üè∑Ô∏è Tagging model
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ tag_cache.json                # üìä Tag cache
‚îÇ
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ modules/                          # üì¶ Core modules
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory_graph/                 # üß† Knowledge Graph (entities, relations)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ embedding_service/            # üîó Text embeddings (OpenAI/HuggingFace)
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ auto_tag_service/             # üè∑Ô∏è Automatic tagging system
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ memory0_service/              # üå± Root memory management
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ system/                       # ‚öôÔ∏è System utilities
‚îÇ
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ .github/                          # ü§ù GitHub integration
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ workflows/                    # üîÑ CI/CD pipelines
```

## ‚öôÔ∏è Configuration

### Environment Variables

| Variable | Description | Default | Required |
|----------|-------------|---------|----------|
| `EMBEDDING_MODE` | Embedding provider | `mock` | No |
| `OPENAI_API_KEY` | OpenAI API key | - | OpenAI mode |
| `HUGGINGFACE_API_KEY` | HuggingFace API key | - | HuggingFace mode |
| `EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS` | Vector dimensions | `384` | No |
| `TAG_MODE` | Tagging algorithm | `basic` | No |
| `TAG_LANGUAGE` | Language support | `th` | No |
| `NODE_ENV` | Environment | `development` | No |

### Access Policy

‡πÑ‡∏ü‡∏•‡πå `config/access_policy.yaml` ‡∏Å‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏ô‡∏î‡∏™‡∏¥‡∏ó‡∏ò‡∏¥‡πå‡∏Å‡∏≤‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏Ç‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏ñ‡∏∂‡∏á:

```yaml
read_only:
  - docs/                    # Documentation files
  - memory/lineage_log.json  # Audit logs

forbidden:
  - __pycache__/             # Python cache
  - node_modules/            # Node dependencies
  - .git/                    # Git metadata
```

## üß™ Testing

### Unit Tests

```bash
# Run all tests
npm test

# Watch mode
npm run test:watch

# Bootstrap test (system initialization)
npm run test:bootstrap
```

### Integration Tests

```javascript
// test/integration/memory.test.js
import { ensureInitialized, createEntities, semanticSearch } from '../index.js';

describe('Knowledge Graph Integration', () => {
  test('should create and search entities', async () => {
    await ensureInitialized();
    
    const entities = [{
      name: 'Test Entity',
      type: 'test',
      observations: ['This is a test observation']
    }];
    
    const created = await createEntities(entities);
    expect(created).toHaveLength(1);
    
    const results = await semanticSearch('test observation');
    expect(results).toHaveLength(1);
    expect(results[0].entity.name).toBe('Test Entity');
  });
});
```

## üîß Development

### Scripts

| Script | Description |
|--------|-------------|
| `npm run validate` | ‡∏ï‡∏£‡∏ß‡∏à‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö‡πÇ‡∏Ñ‡∏£‡∏á‡∏™‡∏£‡πâ‡∏≤‡∏á‡πÇ‡∏õ‡∏£‡πÄ‡∏à‡πá‡∏Å‡∏ï‡πå |
| `npm run describe` | ‡πÅ‡∏™‡∏î‡∏á system description |
| `npm run test:bootstrap` | ‡∏ó‡∏î‡∏™‡∏≠‡∏ö system initialization |
| `npm test` | Run unit tests |
| `npm run dev` | Development mode |
| `npm run lint` | Code linting |
| `npm run format` | Code formatting |

### Code Style

- **ES6 Modules** - ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ `import`/`export` syntax
- **Async/Await** - ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö asynchronous operations
- **Consistent Logging** - ‡πÉ‡∏ä‡πâ emoji prefixes
- **Error Handling** - Try/catch ‡∏ó‡∏∏‡∏Å async function
- **Type Safety** - JSDoc comments ‡∏™‡∏≥‡∏´‡∏£‡∏±‡∏ö complex functions

### Contributing

1. **Fork** repository
2. **Create feature branch** (`git checkout -b feature/amazing-feature`)
3. **Commit changes** (`git commit -m 'Add amazing feature'`)
4. **Push to branch** (`git push origin feature/amazing-feature`)
5. **Open Pull Request**

### Code Review Checklist

- [ ] Code passes linting (`npm run lint`)
- [ ] Tests pass (`npm test`)
- [ ] Documentation updated
- [ ] No breaking changes (or documented)
- [ ] Performance impact assessed
- [ ] Security considerations addressed

## Use with ChatGPT Developer Mode (MCP)

1. Run Node backend:
   ```bash
   npm i
   npx mcp-memory run --port 7070
   ```

2. Run MCP bridge:

   ```bash
   cd mcp
   pip install -r requirements.txt
   BASE_URL=http://localhost:7070 DEFAULT_COLLECTION=notes python server.py
   ```

   MCP SSE URL: `http://localhost:8000/sse/`

3. In ChatGPT ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Connectors ‚Üí Developer mode ‚Üí Add server:

   * Label: `mcp-memory`
   * URL: `http://localhost:8000/sse/`
  * Allowed tools: `search`, `fetch`
  * Approval: `never`

---

### Security notes

- By default the bridge binds to `0.0.0.0`; set `HOST=127.0.0.1` to keep it local.
- JSON payloads are capped at 1 MB and individual documents at ~50 kB.
- Only text payloads are accepted; binary data is rejected.


**Explicit Agent Protocol + KG Memory** - Building transparent, auditable AI memory systems for the future.

[Demo Video](https://youtu.be/demo) | [API Docs](docs/api.md) | [Contribute](CONTRIBUTING.md)
